name: peppermint
description: Peppermint is a self-hosted note-taking and knowledge management tool with a markdown editor, tags, and linked references. It features a visual graph and customizable interface.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes in Markdown with syntax highlighting, live preview, and keyboard shortcuts for efficient note-taking

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize notes with tags for flexible categorization and quick filtering across your knowledge base

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search across all note content to quickly find information regardless of organization structure

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize the editor layout, themes, and appearance to match your workflow and preferences

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export notes in multiple formats including Markdown, HTML, and PDF for sharing or backup
